settings.heading: Download. Find Play. Connect. Track.
settings.description: Join a thriving pickleball community today! Find local pickleball matches and events, follow players you know, and track your progress. Download now and start playing pickleball!

settings.heading: Find  play
settings.list: Discover pickleball matches, leagues, events, and local pickleball players tailored to your skill level. Whether you’re a beginner or a pro, connect with others, find the perfect game close to home, and start playing today.

settings.heading: Track your level
settings.list: Measure your skill level with real-time ratings that update every 24 hours. Compare yourself to pickleball players worldwide and set goals for improvement. Download the iOS pickleball app to get started.

settings.heading: Find Players
settings.list: Easily search for pickleball players, from friends and rivals to top competitors. Explore detailed profiles, stats, and rankings in just a few taps. Download the iOS pickleball app and start discovering today.

settings.heading: UTR-P (Pickleball Rating)
settings.list: Trusted by pickleball players worldwide, our rating updates every 24 hours based on match results. Track your progress in real time and make every pickleball game count.

settings.heading: Create Play
settings.description: Tap the + button and “Create Play” to set up tennis with friends and players near you. It's that easy with the UTR Sports pickleball App.

settings.heading: Track Progress
settings.description: One global platform for everything pickleball. Connecting pickleball players, coaches, clubs, and federations to grow the game.

settings.heading: Search Events
settings.description: Easily find pickleball players, pickleball events and leagues, team leagues, and clubs near you with the Search Events feature.

settings.heading: NEW Pickleball App Features
settings.list: Communities & Groups: Newly located in the center of your homepage under “Communities”, Groups are a place to connect with others in your pickleball communities.
settings.list2: Follow Friends & New Home Feed: Connect with other pickleball players and share updates to build communities and friendships. See all activities, comments, and media from those you follow, including your groups.
settings.list3: Notification Center: Stay up-to-date on activities and actionable updates related to the people and groups you follow with a bell icon anchored at the top right of your home screen.

settings.heading: UTR Sports iOS Pickleball APP
settings.description: The free UTR Sports iOS pickleball app makes it easy to get on the court.
settings.paragrap-title: It’s easier than ever to enjoy more tennis and pickleball and connect with players near you on the UTR Sports app.

settings.heading: Who can download the app?
settings.row_content: The app is available in the App Store for iPhone users.

settings.heading: What are the benefits of the app to pickleball players?
settings.row_content:
The UTR Sports mobile pickleball app offers pickleball players several key benefits:

1. Find Matches Easily: Quickly discover local matches, events, and players at your skill level.

2. Accurate Skill Tracking: Track your rating accurately with the industry-leading UTR-P Rating system.

3. Personalized Play: Enjoy tailored recommendations for pickleball matches and tournaments based on your skill level and preferences.

4. Progress Insights: Get detailed analytics on your game performance to identify areas for improvement.

5. Join Competitive Events: Easily register for tournaments, leagues, and flex play opportunities in your area.

6. Community Connection: Connect with other pickleball players, join clubs, and build your tennis network effortlessly.

Overall, the UTR Sports App helps pickleball players of all levels improve their game, find suitable opponents, and enjoy tennis more than ever before.

settings.heading: Is the UTR Sports app free?
settings.row_content: You can download and sign up for the app completely free. For additional benefits, consider our Power Subscription, which unlocks advanced features designed to help you easily find matches, track your skill level, and get more enjoyment out of your game.

settings.heading: Who’s the app for?
settings.row_content: Everyone! The UTR Sports mobile pickleball app streamlines the steps to get you on the court and competing with players is your level. Pickleball will be at your fingertips—improve, connect, and enjoy the game.

settings.heading: How do I register for a pickleball event?
settings.row_content: Select what you are searching for: pickleball tournaments, leagues, etc. You can then narrow down your search by location, date range, event series, type and more.

settings.heading: What is a UTR-P Rating? Why should I have one?
settings.row_content:
Equipped with over a decade of expertise as the creator of the gold-standard UTR Rating for tennis, UTR Sports offers the most accurate and reliable global rating for pickleball.

The UTR Pickleball Rating (UTR-P) is designed to rate every kind of player, whether you're swinging your first paddle or smashing through pro-level tournaments. The UTR-P includes both provisional and numerical ratings for singles and doubles players.

Players without match results logged will receive a provisional rating (P1-P5) based on a questionnaire. After one match, the player will receive a projected rating, and after seven matches, the rating automatically converts to a reliable decimal rating on a scale of 1.0 - 10.0 (from beginner to expert/pro).

settings.heading: Is the UTR-P Rating for singles or doubles?
settings.row_content: Both! UTR-P Ratings are separate for singles and doubles. Partners are not averaged. UTR Sports considers each doubles game as two individual games which allows for connection across genders and more accuracy.

settings.heading: Who has a UTR-P Rating?
settings.row_content: More than 100,000 players around the globe, including all APP and USA Pickleball players, already have a FREE rating on the UTR Sports platform. Click here to log in or sign up for a free account, to claim your profile, and get rated.

Create your own groups in the UTR Sports pickleball app.
